front.title: Coexistence between Version 1 and Version 2 of the Internet-standard Network Management Framework

abstract.t: The purpose of this document is to describe coexistence between version 2 of the Internet-standard Network Management Framework [1-6], termed the SNMP version 2 framework (SNMPv2), and the original Internet- standard Network Management Framework (SNMPv1). [STANDARDS-TRACK]
